summary: A Flax (JAX) implementation of the RoFormer transformer model fine‑tuned for token‑level classification tasks, providing per‑token predictions such as entity tags or part‑of‑speech labels.
business_intent: Enable developers to integrate a high‑performance, pretrained RoFormer model into NLP pipelines for sequence labeling applications like named entity recognition, POS tagging, or any custom token classification use case.
